1:
"If Yahweh had not been on our side,"
\q let Israel say now,
\q
2:
"if it had not been Yahweh who was on our side
\q when men rose up against us,
\q
3:
then they would have swallowed us up alive
\q when their anger raged against us.
5: Then the raging waters would have drowned us."
6:
Blessed be Yahweh,
\q who has not allowed us to be torn by their teeth.
\q
7:
We have escaped like a bird out of the snare of the fowlers;
\q the snare has been broken, and we have escaped.
8:
Our help is in Yahweh,
\q who made heaven and earth.
124:
\m
\d A song of ascents; of David.
\q
